title.value: История кафедры плодоовощеводства и луговодства Гродненского государственного аграрного университета (к 40-летию образования кафедры)
History of the Department of Fruit and Vegetable Growing and Meadow Management of the Grodno State Agrarian University (to the 40-anniversary of the Department foundation)
History of the Department of Fruit and Vegetable Growing and Meadow Management of the Grodno State Agrarian University (to the 40-anniversary of the Department foundation)

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Brujlo, A.S., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents information about the history of the Department of Fruit and Vegetable Growing and Meadow Management of the Grodno State Agrarian University, which was founded 10 August, 1971. The main directions of the scientific activity of the Department in horticulture, vegetable growing and fodder production, as well as Department's contribution to training for highly qualified modern staff working at Belarusian farms are presented in the article. It is executed about 1200 degree works and projects, it is published about 650 printed works, it trained about 120 agriculturists-horticulturists.
